description:
The New Fish-Man Pirates continue their bloody and violent uprising, and Jimbei begins the story of how he unleashed the monster known as Arlong on the unsuspecting citizens of the East Blue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des liens hantés qui refont surface ! Nami et l`équipage des Hommes-Poissons !
The Haunting Ties! Nami and the Fish-Man Pirates!
Yomigaeru Innen! Nami to Gyojin Kaizokudan!
Ожившие воспоминания! Нами и Пираты Рыболюдей!
إعادة إحياء الرّابط! نامي والقراصنة البرمائيّين!
蘇る因縁! ナミと魚人海賊団!
